SELECT x.rcsj AS 'dispatchTime', x.lx AS 'borrowingType', concat( round(xx.rcds / xxx.sl * 100, 2), "%") AS 'entryRate',
concat(round((xx.zbj-if(ifnull(x.hkze,0)>xx.zbj,xx.zbj,ifnull(x.hkze,0)))/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'unentryRate', concat(round( x.`逾期1天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'oneDay', concat(round(x.`逾期2天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'twoDays', concat(round( x.`逾期3天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'threeDays', concat(round(x.`逾期4天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'fourDays', concat(round(x.`逾期5天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'fiveDays', concat(round(x.`逾期6天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'sixDays', concat(round(x.`逾期7天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'sevenDays', concat(round(x.`逾期8_10天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'eightTOTen', concat(round(x.`逾期11_30天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'toThirty', concat(round(x.`逾期31_60天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'toSixty', concat(round(x.`逾期61_90天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'toNinety', concat(round(x.`逾期91_180天`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'toHundredEight', concat(round(x.`逾期180天以上`/xx.zbj*100,2),"%") AS 'overHundredEight' from (select date(b.create_date) rcsj,d.borrowing_type lx,count(*) rcds, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)<= 1,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期1天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)=2,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期2天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)=3,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期3天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)=4,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期4天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)=5,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期5天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)=6,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期6天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)=7,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期7天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)>=8 and DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)<=10,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期8_10天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)<=30 and DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)>=11,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期11_30天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)<=60 and DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)>=31,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期31_60天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)<=90 and DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)>=61,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期61_90天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)<=180 and DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)>=91,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期91_180天, sum(if(DATEDIFF(clpd.update_Date,d.loan_end_time)>180,clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0),0)) 逾期180天以上, sum(clpd.real_money+ifnull(clpd.realget_accrual,0)) hkze from mman_loan_collection_order b left join credit_loan_pay_detail clpd on clpd.pay_id=b.pay_id left join mman_user_loan d on d.id=b.loan_id where date(b.create_date) is not null group by date(b.create_date),d.borrowing_type) x left join (select date(b.create_date) rcsj,d.borrowing_type lx,count(*) rcds, sum(if(d.borrowing_type=2 and d.paid_money>0,d.paid_money,d.loan_money+ifnull(d.accrual,0))) zbj from mman_loan_collection_order b left join mman_user_loan d on d.id=b.loan_id group by date(b.create_date),d.borrowing_type )xx on x.rcsj=xx.rcsj and x.lx=xx.lx left join (select DATE_ADD(dqr,INTERVAL 1 day) dqr,lx,sl from dqds ) xxx on xxx.lx=x.lx and x.rcsj=xxx.dqr order by x.rcsj desc

SELECT s.dispatchTime AS 'dispatchTime', s.borrowingType AS 'borrowingType', s.entryRate AS 'entryRate', s.unentryRate AS 'unentryRate', s.oneDay AS 'oneDay', s.twoDays AS 'twoDays', s.threeDays AS 'threeDays', s.fourDays AS 'fourDays', s.fiveDays AS 'fiveDays', s.sixDays AS 'sixDays', s.sevenDays AS 'sevenDays', s.eightTOTen AS 'eightTOTen', s.toThirty AS 'toThirty', s.toSixty AS 'toSixty', s.toNinety AS 'toNinety', s.toHundredEight AS 'toHundredEight', s.overHundredEight AS 'overHundredEight' FROM recovery_rate_statistics s
